marquee: Advancing Interoperability. Visit Juniper’s virtual booth to see how we are advancing SONiC and addressing its management challenges.
name: Juniper Networks
intro: At Juniper, we strive to deliver network experiences that transform how people connect, work and live. By challenging the inherent complexity in the Cloud + 5G + AI era, our solutions power the connections that matter most - from education to healthcare to secure banking. Our commitment is to advance real outcomes for network teams and every individual they serve. It’s that simple.

slides.name: Futuriom Juniper and apstra up the sonic ante
